remarks: Convert a quantification over a pair to a conjunction.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ralprg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ralprg.2 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
ralprg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( A. x e. { A , B } ph <-> ( ps /\ ch ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps x $.
